text: Mark Buckley (born September 1, 1960) is a former professional tennis player from the United States. ==Biography== Buckley was born in Bogalusa, Louisiana and attended the University of Alabama, before competing on the professional tennis tour in the 1980s Ranked as high as 124 in singles, he won one Challenger title, at Bergen in 1986. Most notably he reached the second round of the 1987 French Open.
